attributes.action: Recognize Turkish Cypriots human right to be able to travel direct to his/her home land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask the british government to recognize the Turkish Republic Of Northern Cyprus and to recognize that Turkey's intervention was not illegal.

rejection.details: Do you want the Government to recognise the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus' rights to exist as a country?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
